titleStmt.title: A brief account of the province of Pennsilvania lately granted by the King, under the great seal of England, to William Penn, and his heirs and assigns.
titleStmt.author: Penn, William, 1644-1718.
England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II). Proclamations. 1681-04-02.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Benjamin Clark in George-Yard in Lombard-street, bookseller,

notesStmt.note: Includes: The King's declaration to the inhabitants and planters of the province of Pennsylvania.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
